nodes.text: Zama Brak was a Cold War-era smuggler that unwittingly started the rakghoul pandemic, after agreeing to smuggle an infected risp for Doctor Sannus Lorrick aboard the passenger liner, the Stardream, beginning the outbreak.

Brak was created for the Star Wars: The Old Republic world event, where both players of the Galactic Republic and Sith Empire could uncover a series of journal entries of various passengers and crew aboard the Stardream.
